title: Doug Mayes, Charlotte TV news pioneer, dies at 93
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Local - Today 
He was Charlotte’s first permanent TV anchor in 1952An accomplished musician, he played at the Grand Ol’ OpryEnshrined into Charlotte Br...
